overview:
Matija Kopic is the founder and CEO of Farmeron, a company which helps farmers across the world to manage their farming data online and to do farm performance analysis using exciting statistics.

Matija is an IT engineer specialized in MSSQL, C#, VB.NET, but also in SaaS, marketing, HR and customer relationships management.

He graduated in 2010 from University of Zagreb, Faculty of Organization and Informatics as Master of Informatics with the degree in Computer science. During studies, Matija received prestigious UNIZG’s Rector’s Award. Also, he received several Dean’s Awards for excellence. He won several IT and Management competitions during study (FOI CORE NUM, ISBC Ljubljana) and chaired the organization board for FOI IT and Business Forum.

Matija is in love with music and has graduated from music school. He actively plays several instruments and has written a book on folk music in 2010.
